entries.title: Policy rate - The Central Bank of the Republic of Uzbekistan
entries.text: The policy rate is a key instrument of monetary policy which determines monetary conditions that are necessary to ensure stable inflation within the 5% target.

entries.title: Monetary policy Objective and principles
entries.text: The Central Bank develops and implements monetary policy with the goal of ensuring price stability, which means maintaining a low and stable level of inflation.

entries.title: Press-releases - The Central Bank of the Republic of Uzbekistan
entries.text: At the meeting on July 25, 2024, the Board of the Central Bank decided to cut the policy rate by 0.5 percentage points to 13.5 percent per annum.
